Title: Wann wird es endlich wieder so, wie es nie war
Writer: Sonja Heiss, Lars Hubrich, Joachim Meyerhoff
Actors: Arsseni Bultmann, Laura Tonke, Devid Striesow
Plot: Joachim Meyerhoff's autobiographical recollections include his childhood and teenager years living on the premises of a psychiatric clinic, his father being the director of the child and adolescent ward.
